snippet: Volunteers for Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County, Arizona, look a lot like his paid deputies as they keep an eye on schools.
abstract: Volunteers for Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County, Arizona, add task of safeguarding 59 public schools, in wake of Newtown, Conn, massacre; posse of 3,000 is best known for its supporting role in sheriff's immigration raids.
lead_paragraph: Volunteers for Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County, Arizona, look a lot like his paid deputies as they keep an eye on schools.

headline.seo: Arizona Sheriff Adds School Patrols to Posse’s Duties
headline.main: An Added Mission for Arizona Sheriff’s Immigration Posse: School Patrols
headline.print_headline: An Added Mission for Arizona Sheriff’s Immigration Posse: School Patrols
